timeline.author: zzmao

replies.bodyText: AmbryServerRequests is a direct child of AmbryRequests and this method is trying to override the same method from AmbryRequests, but they are exactly the same method. So we can remove it.
replies.author: justinlin-linkedin

timeline.author: jsjtzyy

timeline.bodyText: I don't think we need to explicitly use default here.
timeline.author: jsjtzyy

replies.bodyText: Interface's abstract method can't have it's owner body unless it's a default method.
replies.author: justinlin-linkedin

timeline.author: jsjtzyy

timeline.bodyText: Can you explain a little more about this exception?
timeline.author: jsjtzyy

replies.bodyText: there are two possible responses for undelete request: 1 Normal response with a lifeVersion and NO_ERROR code, 2 error response with a invalid lifeVersion number and any error code rather than NO_ERROR. That's why I am throwing out an exception here.
replies.author: justinlin-linkedin
